00044 class YardInvType: public XMLNode

00055         float percent;

00134         { return (child("INV_Oversized_Flag").data() == "T") ? 'T' : 'F'; }
00135     bool IsOverSized() const 
00136         { return (child("INV_Oversized_Flag").data() == "T") ? true : false; }
00139     char MustShipFreightS() const
00140         { return (child("INV_Ship_By_Freight").data() == "T") ? 'T' : 'F'; }

00142         { return (child("INV_Ship_By_Freight").data() == "T") ? true : false; }

00148         
00150     string GetBulkPricing() const
00151         {  
00152             stringstream ret;
00153             vector<XMLNode> prices = child("INV_Bulk_Price").const_children();
00154             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < prices.size(); i++)
00155                 ret << prices[i]; /*<< ((i < (prices.size() - 1)) ? "\n" : "");*/
00156             return ret.str();
00157         }
00158         
00159     double GetBulkPrice(unsigned int quant)
00160         { return ToDouble(child("INV_Bulk_Price").child(ToStr(quant)).data()); }
00161

00163         { return child("INV_Comment").data(); }
00164

00166         { return YardDate(child("INV_Date_Last_Received")); }

00208         { child("INV_Weight_Pounds").setData(ToStr(num, YS_DEFAULT_WEIGHT_PRECISION)); }
00210     void SetTaxType(int num) 
00211         { child("INV_REF_TAX_Tax_Type").setData(ToStr(num)); }
00213     void SetVendorId(long int num) 
00214         { child("INV_REF_VND_Vendor_ID").setData(ToStr(num)); }

00223     /* bulk pricing addition... 
00224         XML Makes this sooooo easy */
00225    
00227     void AddBulkPrice(long quantity, float discount)
00228         { child("INV_Bulk_Price").child(ToStr(quantity)).setData(ToStr(discount, YS_BULK_DISCOUNT_PRECISION)); }
00230     void RemoveBulkPrice(long quantity)
00231         { child("INV_Bulk_Price").delChild(ToStr(quantity)); }
00232    
00234     void SetOverSized(bool cond)
00235         { (cond) ? child("INV_Oversized_Flag").setData("T") : child("INV_Oversized_Flag").setData("F"); }
00236  
00238     void SetShipFreight(bool cond) 
00239         { (cond) ? child("INV_Ship_By_Freight").setData("T") : child("INV_Ship_By_Freight").setData("F"); }
00240     
00241     void SetLastReceived(YardDate& date)
00242         {
00243             date.setName("INV_Date_Last_Recieved");
00244             child("INV_Date_Last_Recieved") = date;
00245         }
00246         
00247     void SetComment(const string& str)
00248         { child("INV_Comment").setData(str); }
00254     virtual string ToString(const string& delim = ",", bool quotes = true) const;
